Package org.hwr.equaly.model.dbHandler

Class DBHandlerImpl

java.lang.Object
org.hwr.equaly.model.dbHandler.DBHandlerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBHandler
@Component public class DBHandlerImpl extends Object implements DBHandler
Takes care of every interaction with a given database file. Processes DB requests and returns substantive or article information for either german or english words

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Establish a connection between Database file and Java backend. Connection should persist to rule out tampering while at work.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface DBHandler

    • getSubstantiveFor

      public Substitute getSubstantiveFor​(String substantive, com.github.pemistahl.lingua.api.Language language)
      Given a substantive, head into the DB to find a replacement and return either this replacement or "" if none could be found
      Specified by:
      getSubstantiveFor in interface DBHandler
      Parameters:
      substantive - the substantive for which a replacement is to be found
      Returns:
      the replacement or an empty string of no replacement could be found

    • addSubstantive

      public void addSubstantive​(DBTicket dbTicket)
      Add a Substantive with case and gender aswell as (maybe) a replacement for this word.
      Specified by:
      addSubstantive in interface DBHandler
      Parameters:
      dbTicket - contains everything about the information on new words to be added

    • getArticleFamily

      public Article getArticleFamily​(String token, com.github.pemistahl.lingua.api.Language language)
      Find the current article's family - that is, if the current word is an article. Limit search to word sets for a given language.
      Specified by:
      getArticleFamily in interface DBHandler
      Parameters:
      token - the potential article
      language - the text's / token set's language
      Returns:
      null if nothing was found, the word family identifying string otherwise

    • getArticleFor

      public String getArticleFor​(String articleFamily, String token, com.github.pemistahl.lingua.api.Language language, String fall, String gender, String numerus)
      Given an article family and details about a current article's state and its desired state, find an article for the given casus, numerus, genus
      Specified by:
      getArticleFor in interface DBHandler
      Parameters:
      articleFamily - identifies the word group of the article
      fall - casus (Nominativ, Genitiv etc.)
      gender - (m, f, n)
      numerus - (singular, plural)
      Returns:
      the article that fits the search description or null if this could not be satisfied.
